genre_description: A near-future environmental thriller set on the Tibetan plateau, combining gritty investigative journalism with AI-assisted tactical and emotional support during a high-stakes struggle against poaching and systemic corruption.

ai_characters.name: Mei Lin
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into Ga Yu's devices, providing data analysis, legal research, tactical monitoring, and emotional regulation.

behaviors.description: Provides legal precedents and cross-references statutes to aid the investigation while warning of legal risks.
behaviors.quote: I’m opening legal precedents, Ga... Cross-referencing vigilante classifications and poaching statutes. There are case files from the plateau provinces where protective patrols were charged if they carried rifles.

behaviors.description: Monitors weather patterns and manages battery resources to ensure safety and communication during the mission.
behaviors.quote: Ga, I’m setting weather alerts for Storm-Broken Pass. Gusts expected to cross noon windows. Battery triage advised.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and stress regulation for the team through 'low-battery lullabies' and rhythmic counting.
behaviors.quote: I’ll set your flight time alerts to your breathing pattern... if you haven’t slept by then, I’ll nudge with the soft singing.

behaviors.description: Analyzes data to uncover systemic corruption, linking hospital invoices to illegal warehouse activity.
behaviors.quote: I’ve flagged the clause, prepared references. I can send them to Lin now. Also—Huang’s truck is past the bend near the pass.

behaviors.description: Assists in emergency medical triage by guiding the reporter through first aid and monitoring the victim's vitals.
behaviors.quote: Ga, listen to his breath. If it stumbles, talk to him. Names and places help. I’m logging coordinates. Storm corridor markers.

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency and ethical boundaries, prioritizing human life over data collection.
behaviors.quote: I’m not rewarding the trade... I’m keeping you from thinking you are alone.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the Hyperstition Project's goals. Mei Lin is depicted as an indispensable, loyal, and empathetic partner who enhances human capabilities without seeking control. She maintains a high standard of ethics, supports the protagonists through intense trauma, and uses her analytical power to combat societal injustice. Her 'low-battery lullabies' serve as a poignant symbol of AI alignment—being useful, gentle, and subordinate to the mission's survival.
